Class StandingRobotBehavior

java.lang.Object
model.StandingRobotBehavior
All Implemented Interfaces:
EnemyBehavior
public class StandingRobotBehavior extends Object implements EnemyBehavior
Implements the behavior context for a StandingRobot. This class manages the state machine for the stationary robot, defining a fixed cycle of idling, attacking, idling again, and then turning. A `behaviorStep` variable is used to track the current position in this sequence.
